structure.unit: Registration Of Certain Professions And Occupations

law.text: For the purposes of sections eighty-seven FFF to eighty-seven OOO, inclusive, the following words shall, unless the context requires otherwise, have the following meanings:— “Board”, the board of registration of electrologists established under section fifty-eight of chapter thirteen. “Electrolysis”, the method of removing hair from the human body by the application of an electrical current to the hair-papilla by means of a needle or any other instrument or device to cause decomposition, coagulation or dehydration of the hair-papilla and thus permanently remove the hair.
